name: Connectionism:Pain Control
description:
The music in the video is the BGM of the game.The lights flashing with the rhythm of the BGM.

  • Lots of action:112 playable robots, each robot's actions are independent.
  • Each punch hits flesh:A single robot consists of hundreds of pieces, and will burst outward in response to damage.
  • Cool Music:more than 60 dynamic background music.The ability of the robot will change according to the rhythm and its "Musicity".
